sentences.en: All accomplishments and success come from sustained endeavor.
sentences.cn: 所有的成就都来自于不懈的努力。

sentences.en: an outstanding example of human endeavor
sentences.cn: 人类努力进取的突出例证

sentences.en: And in your generation, I see the spirit we need in this endeavor -- an optimism that beats in the hearts of so many young people around the world.
sentences.cn: 在你们这一代，我看到我们作出这一努力所需要的精神——洋溢在全世界各地如此多的年轻人心中的乐观情绪。

sentences.en: He had more doubts as he started his endeavor.
sentences.cn: 在开始尝试时,他充满了怀疑.

sentences.en: He promised that he would endeavor to correct his behavior.
sentences.cn: 他保证他会尽力纠正自己的行为.

sentences.en: How can we endeavor to prolong the brevity of human life?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样才能延长短促的人生?

sentences.en: I'll endeavor to ascertain her mind.
sentences.cn: 我得先努力弄清楚她的想法.

sentences.en: Implying that human endeavor could turn back the tides of fate.
sentences.cn: 言下大有以人力挽回天命之意.

sentences.en: Miss elson endeavor to persuade Walter to work hard.
sentences.cn: 伊莎小姐努力设法去说服瓦特工作不懈.

sentences.en: My endeavor is not just for loving someone, but also for self - respect .
sentences.cn: 我的努力应该不仅仅是为了爱某个人, 因为 自尊 才是最重要的.

sentences.en: She improved visibly from day to day, until Martin wondered if he was doing right, for he knew that all her compliance and endeavor was for his sake.
sentences.cn: 她一天比一天进步了，直到马丁怀疑起自己的做法是否得体。 因为他明白她的这一切迁就和努力都是为了他。

sentences.en: The energy, the faith, the devotion which we bring to this endeavor will light our country and all who serve it -- and the glow from that fire can truly light the world.
sentences.cn: 我们在这场努力中所献出的精力、信念与虔诚、将照亮我们的国家以及所有为国家服务的人，而从这一火焰所聚出的光辉必能照明全世界。

sentences.en: Thereupon, we knew, our endeavor was valuable.
sentences.cn: 于是, 我们知道, 我们的努力是有价值的!

sentences.en: This book has been an endeavor to find interesting questions.
sentences.cn: 本书就是寻找有趣问题的尝试.

sentences.en: To perfect wealth my wit for to endeavor.
sentences.cn: 并尽我才智把完美的财富获得.

sentences.en: We always endeavor to please our customers.
sentences.cn: 我们总是竭尽全力让顾客满意。

sentences.en: We cannot succeed in this endeavor alone, but we can lead it.
sentences.cn: 我们不可能独自完成这项努力，但我们可以发挥带头作用。

sentences.en: We endeavor to make our customers satisfied.
sentences.cn: 我们力图使顾客都满意。

sentences.en: We make every endeavor to satisfy our customers.
sentences.cn: 我们尽全力使顾客满意.

sentences.en: We shall endeavor to clear up these points for you.
sentences.cn: 这一点我们将努力替你弄清楚.

sentences.en: We shall naturally endeavor to win them to our side.
sentences.cn: 我们自然要竭力把他们争取到自己这边来.

sentences.en: We should all endeavor to be more considerate of others.
sentences.cn: 我们都应该努力多为别人着想.

words.tran_cn: 竭力做到，试图或力图（做某事）

trans.tran_en: an attempt to do something new or difficult

trans.tran_cn: 努力， 尽力， 尝试
